object_type.description: Type of object to create. Available types: Cube, Ball, Cylinder.

id.description: A unique 10-character alphanumeric string (uppercase and lowercase letters). Used to identify the object.

name: rotate_object
description: Rotate an object by a given angle. Only affects the Y-axis rotation.

target.description: ID of the object to rotate.

angle.description: Rotation angle in degrees (0â€“360), applied around the Y-axis.

name: move_object
description: Move an object to a new world-space position.

target.description: ID of the object to move.

name: scale_object
description: Scale the object uniformly in all directions.

target.description: ID of the object to scale.

factor.description: Scaling factor (e.g., 1.0 = original size, 2.0 = double size).

name: set_color
description: Set the color of an object using a hex code.

target.description: ID of the object to apply the color to.

name: set_weight
description: Assign a weight number value to the object.

target.description: ID of the object to set the weight for.

name: set_texture
description: Set the texture of an object. Texture name must match one of the available options or their synonyms.

target.description: ID of the object to set the texture for.

texture.description: Available Textures: Wooden (alias : wood), Metallic (metal), Marble (stone), Brick (bricks, masonry). Use one of the main types instead of alias.

name: select_object
description: Select an object in the scene (for highlighting or further operations).

target.description: ID of the object to select.

name: handle_unknown_command
description: Handle unknown or unsupported user commands gracefully.

reason.description: Explanation of why the command could not be understood or executed.
